name: Safe Corners First
description: Prioritize corner tiles (top-left, top-right, bottom-left, bottom-right) as they statistically carry lower risk early in the game.

name: Cross Pattern

name: Diagonal Sweep
description: Select tiles diagonally from top-left to bottom-right. It often avoids clusters where mines tend to group.

name: Edge Guard
description: Avoid the center; stick to tiles along the outer edge except corners. Helps with mine avoidance.

name: Pyramid Start
description: Start from the center and expand outward in a pyramid shape for strategic safe openings.
